def_en: A bus is a large motor vehicle which carries passengers from one place to another. Buses drive along particular routes, and you have to pay to travel in them.

def_cn: 用大客车运送；乘坐公共汽车
def_en: When someone is bussed to a particular place or when they bus there, they travel there on a bus.
In some parts of the United States, when children are bused to school, they are transported by bus to a school in a different area so that children of different races can be educated together.
